author: TED
description: Democracy is about having choices — and authoritarianism is about not having them, says lawyer and writer Ian Bassin. Detailing the seven steps of the authoritarian playbook, he invites us all to put aside our differences and rethink our role in the fight for freedom, revealing the hope and power behind every choice we make.
title: Lawyer Ian Bassin says authoritarians throughout history have followed these 7-steps #TEDTallks
